public class OGHManagerImpl
extends OGHManagerPOA

A class implementing the Object Group Handler Manager Interface.

See the IRL idl documentation.

push_structured_event

public void push_structured_event(org.omg.CosNotification.StructuredEvent notification)
                           throws org.omg.CosEventComm.Disconnected
This method is used to raises a Fault Report. The Fault Notifier invoke push_structured_event for all registered consumer, i.e. the Object Group.
Parameters:
notification - The structured event occours.
Throws:
org.omg.CosEventComm.Disconnected -  
See Also:
IRLFaultNotifierImpl.push_structured_fault(org.omg.CosNotification.StructuredEvent)
